Home.textAbout: Hi, I'm Mateus Fernandes, a Technical Development graduate from SENAI CIMATEC and a student pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. As a Front-End Developer, I have experience with Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind, as well as knowledge in MySQL, Firebase, and Node.js for building APIs. Specializing in web development, I create landing pages and static websites, always applying SEO techniques for optimization. My focus is to deliver efficient solutions with excellent performance to ensure the best user experience. ðŸš€

Home.descriptionBarber: Responsive landing page for a barber shop, with an elegant design, intuitive navigation and clear presentation of services and information.
Home.descriptionCineverse: Cineverse is an innovative application for movie and series enthusiasts, offering an intuitive and modern interface to explore films and series.
Home.descriptionSenaiBot: This project aims to optimize the patent search process at INPI (National Institute of Industrial Property) through automation, improving the efficiency and speed of accessing patent data.
Home.descriptionDevCurrency: Dev Currency is a practical and efficient application for tracking cryptocurrency values in real time. With a clean and intuitive interface.
